column6: The Communications team leads DECC work on external relationships with media, stakeholders and public. This includes media work with print and broadcast outlets, direct contact with major companies, NGOs and consumer organisations, as well as close links with public through digital channels and in correspondence. The team also organises ministerial visits and plans long-term strategy around key themes. Internally, the team coordinates messaging to all staff through a range of channels, including intranet, large-scale group meetings and face-to-face communication.
